problem.markdown:
1. A process equipment in which biological conversion takes place is called as () Bioreactor () Fermenter () Bioprocess (x) Bioreactor/ Fermenter
2) Autoclave is used for (x) Sterilization () Filtration () Evaporation () Distillation
3) The time for autoclaving depends on () Contents Quality (x) Contents Quantity () Quality and Quantity () None of these
4) For controlling solid bed temperature ---- is used as the manipulated variable () Tank water flow rate () Acid flow rate (x) Jacket coolant flow rate () Saturated sterile air flow rate
5) ------- control scheme is preferred to control bed temperature in fermenter (x) PID () On-Off () Manual () MPC
